body.p: 1. Ammihud’s son and the representative of Simeon’s tribe in the division of the land of Canaan among Israel’s 10 tribes west of the Jordan (Nm 34:20).
2. KJV rendering of Samuel, Elkanah’s son, in 1 Chronicles 6:33-34. See Samuel (Person).
3. Tola’s son and chief in Issachar’s tribe (1 Chr 7:2).
